hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #8# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Medigoron sells the earliest Breath of the Wild demo.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #3# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Sun's Song#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Shadow Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of time.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: ${12 68 79}They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
